name: Goby Click
description:
Goby Click is a Prototype autoclicker fishing game. Currently the difficulty scaling isn't balanced appropriately and I have not added more expensive units besides the two to deal with increasing levels of difficulty.

-To Be Added-

More Expensive Units

Updated Models and Animation for fish and units

Balanced Scaling Difficulty

Restricted Unit Placement

More Diverse Fishing Spawning

Stats Board (Fish Caught, Units Placed, Fish Loss, Total Time, Etc)

Option Menu to Change Volume

This prototype is to conlude whether or no a game with this kind of functionality would work as a casual auto-clicker. There is no losing, it is just a run in the side tab auto clicker. Right now with the current difficulty scaling, it is difficult to run in a side tab for very long as it scales too quickly.
